definition: (bird species of China) oriental turtle dove (Streptopelia orientalis)
(bird species of China) laughing dove (Spilopelia senegalensis)
(bird species of China) European turtle dove (Streptopelia turtur)
(bird species of China) red turtle dove (Streptopelia tranquebarica)
(bird species of China) Eurasian collared dove (Streptopelia decaocto)
(bird species of China) spotted dove (Spilopelia chinensis)

sentences.english: I'm also crashing at my studio a lot which is at Culver City.
sentences.chinese: 我也經常住在我在斑鳩城的工作室裏。

sentences.english: Nung-fu saves a dove in the chick and duckling nursery.
sentences.chinese: 農夫在小雞小鴨區救了一隻斑鳩。

sentences.english: Sometimes they imitate a turtledove picking up grain.
sentences.chinese: 有時他們模擬“斑鳩喫穀子”等形象。

sentences.english: A diamond dove in a wind tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 一隻珍珠斑鳩正在風洞中飛行。

sentences.english: Do you hear the cooing of the turtledove?
sentences.chinese: 你可聽到那斑鳩的叫喚？

sentences.english: Arrives in front of Nanshan, I first turn own the turtledove.
sentences.chinese: 到達南山之前，我首先將自己變成斑鳩。

sentences.english: Found inside a pile of pigeon and a turtledove, color really looks good.
sentences.chinese: 發現一堆信鴿裏面有一隻斑鳩，花色還真的很好看。

definition: see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
